attributes.action: Knighthood for Captain Tom Moore for his service to the country and the NHS
attributes.additional_details: He has not only raised a phenomenal sum of money for a very good cause but he has captured the heart of the nation during this epidemic and is providing hope and joy to so many.
attributes.background: We believe Captain Tom Moore should receive a knighthood aged 100 after walking 100 laps of his garden and raising £10m and counting for NHS charities

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
